name: SHOOT-OUT!
description:
SHOOT-OUT!

- Simple, single button gameplay

- Fun, fast-paced action

- Both single-player and multiplayer game modes

- Music from nosoapradio.us

Controls

Player 1 : Q to shoot

Player 2 : P to shoot

*First player to get 3 points wins*

UPDATE 8 / 25

- Added single-player mode

- Updated artwork (Background, bullets)

UPDATE 9 / 4

- Bug Fixes
